name: Spaceville
description:
Rebuild a planet by growing you crops and selling them to build credits. Once you have credits use them to buy grass and trees. Make the purple planet pretty again!

Controls:

KeyControlW,S,A,DMove the cameraLeft ClickBuy crops or Sell grown crops Q and EChange Crop

Notes:

This is the first released game using my new engine so any issue reports are extremally valuable even long after the game jam.
